name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many Chinese real estate companies have encountered a "life-or-death situation", and Shimao Group and Sunac China have been petitioned for liquidation.
Many domestic bonds of Vanke have fallen, among which the price of "21 Ke 06" has fallen to 57 yuan.
The restructuring goal of Country Garden's overseas bonds: reduce debt by US$11.6 billion and extend the maturity to 11.5 years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
There are drones everywhere
Recently, the Ukrainian military produced another batch of surrender leaflets for North Korean soldiers, which read: "Don't die in vain, surrender is the only right way"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 12, someone uploaded the previous speech of the Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Mao Ning again: "At any time, China will not abandon its compatriots, and the motherland will always be their strong backing." This caused netizens to mock: "Only one person (Wang Xing) came back from a room, that's really powerful" 
"When will the other people trapped in Myanmar come back?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In an interview at the U.S. Embassy in Beijing, U.S. Ambassador to China Burns claimed that nearly 400 Chinese companies provided dual-use products to Russia.
He also pointed out that China provided 90% of the microelectronics for Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
